name: Lighting
description: Lighting styles and setups for cinematic mood

example.prompt: low-angle warm sunlight, elongated soft-edged shadows, gentle falloff, warm rim separation, slightly lifted blacks, ~4500K white balance
example.video-generation-prompt: A quiet coastal overlook at golden hour. Low-angle warm sunlight paints a couple leaning on a railing as elongated soft-edged shadows trail behind them. Warm rim separation outlines their faces with a honeyed glow, gentle falloff keeps contrast soft, and slightly lifted blacks give a nostalgic warmth. White balance sits around ~4500K as they trade calm smiles and watch waves roll in.
